Tonight is the annual District Music Awards at FMS, a night to recognize all our student musicians. Congratulations to all for a great 2018-19 school year!

Here's to looking back at two of our student musicians, Colin Ingraham (left) and Saurabh Kumar (middle), with Albany Pro Musica Artistic Director Jose Daniel Flores-Caraballo after a May 5 concert at The Troy Savings Bank Music Hall.

Colin and Saurabh were selected to be Albany Pro Musica Student Apprentices, and were able to sing and rehearse side-by-side with the Albany Pro Musica chorus.

Exceptional high school vocal musicians are chosen as apprentices based on the results of their most recent NYSSMA (NYS School Music Association) ratings, experiences in in honors and community choirs and recommendations from their music teachers.

The decision was based on the community's feedback and what would address the district's most immediate needs; aging infrastructure in the district's seven school buildings, improvements for safety security and technology systems district-wide, and modernizing high school science labs.
